settings.content: We strongly recommended to leave this setting enabled. Amp pages perform significantly better in search results on mobile leading to higher traffic and conversions.

What is AMP?  AMP stands for Accelerated Mobile Pages. We have implemented AMP on the product and collection pages of this theme to help your content rank higher in Google mobile searches. If activated, the user will see a reduced, faster version of these pages before proceeding to the full mobile version of the site.
